channel.title: Blank 317 Server and Client
channel.description:
Well im here to say that im going to be developing a blank server & client, the first thing i will be doing is adding all custom through the cache, by using the cache editor. This sounds easy but it takes alot of patients, im also adding the correct items in the correct item id. If you look at a DeltaScape server you will se that they use the Excaliber as the "Armadyl godsword" I'm making it so all the new items are in the correct id format, Example: Armadyl godsword, ID: 11694 instead of covering up the Excaliber. I think this is a great project because we can add custom items, and we don't have to worry about what original item we have to delete to make a custom. Flame if you want, i don't care.
Completed: Game Frame Magic icons Prayer icons Combat icons
In Development: New Item Id's Custom staff crowns Hitpoints tab beside Minimap Interface edit More to be added to the list...

item.title: Blank 317 Server and Client
item.dc:creator: @ZuberZoft ZuberZoft
item.description:
@ZuberZoft wrote:

Well im here to say that im going to be developing a blank server & client, the first thing i will be doing is adding all custom through the cache, by using the cache editor. This sounds easy but it takes alot of patients, im also adding the correct items in the correct item id. If you look at a DeltaScape server you will se that they use the Excaliber as the “Armadyl godsword” I’m making it so all the new items are in the correct id format, Example: Armadyl godsword, ID: 11694 instead of covering up the Excaliber. I think this is a great project because
we can add custom items, and we don’t have to worry about what original item we have to delete to make a custom. Flame if you want, i don’t care.

Completed:
Game Frame
Magic icons
Prayer icons
Combat icons

In Development:
New Item Id’s
Custom staff crowns
Hitpoints tab beside Minimap
Interface edit
More to be added to the list…
